about_the_game:
Pristine beaches, bouncing night clubs, luxurious apartments and housing... All of this and more awaits the CEOs and shareholders of the largest and most lucrative mega corporations of Cyber City. Antiques, jewels, paintings, sculptures and more are all within easy reach for those with the money and connections. The Silver Strip is one of the only areas of Cyber City not filled with trash and debris.

This asset pack contains more than 2,150 tiles to create beautiful and luxurious environments.

In here you will find a huge variety of tiles including:

* High-scale decorations, antiques, jewels, etc
* Night club furniture and interiors, including bars, dance stages, DJ sets, and more
* Luxury beach items
* High-scale cyberpunk bedroom décor, bathroom fixtures, and much more
* Exterior buildings
* Interior building pieces including floors, walls, doors, etc
* A wide-range of furniture for nightclubs, beach houses, and luxury apartments
* Pre-made furniture clusters for quick and easy map decorating
* Monorail parts
* Paintings and wall deco for luxury homes and offices
* Tropical trees and flora
* High-tech roadways, catwalks, alcoves, kiosks, etc
* Animated Waves
* And much more!

These tiles are fully compatible with all other PVGames tiles from the RPGTools line of assets. They go together especially well with the Doomsday assets.

* Please note that the tiles in this pack are not formatted as tilesheets. They are all individual PNG graphics.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
